terms & Conditions

Last updated: [16.07.2025, 20:57]

Welcome to our website! By continuing to browse and use this website, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions of use, which together with our Privacy Policy, govern your relationship with Ceramic Soul in the context of this website.

If you do not agree to any part of these terms, please do not use our website.

1. General

This website is owned and operated by Ceramic Soul. All products featured on the website are handmade from clay,with the emphasis on craftsmanship and individual design.

2. Copyright

All content on this website, including images, text, logos and graphics, is the property of Ceramic Soul or used with permission and is protected by copyright. No copying, distribution or use of any materials without written permission is permitted.

3. Products and Description

We strive to provide accurate descriptions of our products, but please note that all items are handmade, so there may be slight variations in size, color or texture. This is not a defect, but part of the uniqueness of handmade work.

4. Ordering and Payment

Orders are placed through the website. After confirming the order, you will receive an email with details. Payment is made in advance using the available payment methods. We reserve the right to refuse an order for any reason.

5. Delivery and Returns

We deliver to [delivery countries or regions]. Delivery times depend on the selected carrier and region. In case of receiving a damaged product, please contact us within 48 hours of receiving the package.
Return or exchange of the product is possible only within the specified period and provided that the product has not been used and is in its original condition.

6. Liability

We are not liable for any direct or indirect damages that may arise from the use of this site or the products purchased. All information on the site is provided "as is", without any warranties.

7. Changes to the terms

We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Changes will be effective from the moment they are published on the site. We recommend that you regularly review this page to familiarize yourself with the current version of the terms.

8. Use of the Site

You may not use the Site for any unlawful purpose, send spam, interfere with the security or operation of the Site, or attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Site or its servers.

9. Contact information
